p: The major constituents observed in the fixed O. speciosa oil in this study were different from those found in the hot oil extracted using an organic solvent. Darnet et al. [ 17] found oleic (75.7%) and palmitic (18.9%) acids at higher quantities in the oil. Similarly, Silva et al. [ 6] found oleic (74.0%) and palmitic (16.7%) acids as the main constituents of this oil. In contrast, unsaturated fatty acids were predominant in the oil obtained in both studies.
